lines.text: I told you I was a good dancer. Can I keep you?
Casper?
There's a girl... on my bed. YES!
[Casper sitting on his old sled, takes his baseball cap off]

I begged and begged my dad to give me this sled, but he acted like I couldn't even have it, because I didn't know how to ride it. But then one morning, I came down for breakfast and there it was, just for me, for no reason at all. I took it out, went sledding all day. And my dad said "that's enough" but I couldn't stop, I was having so much fun It got late, got dark, got cold... and I got sick, and my dad got sad.
What's it like to die?
Like... being born, only backwards. I remember, I didn't go where I was supposed to go. I just stayed behind, so my dad wouldn't be lonely.

[runs out of the house frantic]
Who you gonna call? Someone else.
All I want's a friend.
All for one, and one for all!
Catch your pants before they fall!
On the runway now we have Dr. James Harvey wearing smashing underwear.
Marky Mark, he's not!

James, I know you have been searching for me, but there's something you must understand. You and Kat loved me so well when I was alive that I have no unfinished business, please don't let me be yours.
Drop dead.
Too late.

That was a very noble thing you did tonight, Casper. I know Kat will never forget it. She needs her father. And I know yours won't forget it either. You fulfilled his greatest dream, Casper, and I know he is very, very proud of you. And for what you've done, I'm giving you your dream in return. But it's just for tonight. Sort of a Cinderella deal.
So I have until midnight?
Ten.
Hey, Cinderella got until midnight.
Cinderella wasn't twelve years old.
You guys are disgusting, obnoxious creeps!

[in unison]
Thank you!
I mean, what's your problem? He's just cleaning the floor!
Hey, shut up, skinbag!
Piss off!
Take a hike!
Get a grave!
DIBS! Get this thing cooking, you flaccid little worm you!
Ah, Carrigan! How kind of you to drop in!
[Carrigan laughs]
You know, if there's one thing I've learned from you, it's 'always kick 'em when they're down'. And baby, you're six feet under. Oh, what a shame!
[grabs vial]
Sorry, sweetheart; we're through!

[gasps as she sees that Dibs is about to break the vial]
I am not gonna forget this, you ungrateful, lousy little worm you!

[chuckles sarcastically]
You can haunt me all you want, but it's gonna be in a great big expensive house, with lovely purple wallpaper, and great big green carpets, and a little dog, called 'Carrigan' - a bitch, just like you! I've got the power! I've got the treasure!
And you have a flight to catch!
Huh?
[Carrigan flings Dibs out the window]

[turns to Casper and Kat, calmly]
Any other takers?
No, but aren't you forgetting something?
What?
Your unfinished business.
My what?
You know, unfinished business. All ghosts have unfinished business. That's why they don't cross over.
Unfinished business? I have no unfinished business. I have my treasure, my mansion. I have EVERYTHING. I'm... just... perfect!
[she laughs evilly until a flash of light comes out of her as a sign that she is crossing over]

[gasps]
Wait! Wait! I lied! I have unfinished business - lots of unfinished business!
[more flashes of light appear]
I-I'm not ready to cross over yet! Wait! You tricked me, you rotten little rats!
[Carrigan screams as the flashes of light causes her to vanish without a trace]

[appears as a ghost to Dibs]
Not so fast, little man. The bitch is back!
[after seeing a ghost]
Dad, I'm sorry.
For what?
For not believing you, for thinking you were a total loser.
Aww honey... apologize later!
I can see right through you.
Yeah, kind of happens when you haven't got any skin.
I thought I had a hundred things to say when I saw you... but - how?
Let's just say you know three crazy ghosts who kept their word.
Sometimes I worry that I'm starting to forget.
Forget what?

My mom. Just certain things. The sound of her making breakfast downstairs. The way she'd put on her lipstick, so carefully. I do remember, she always used Ivory soap, and when she'd hug me, I'd breathe her in, so deep. And I remember before I'd go to sleep she'd whisper in my ear, "stardust in the eyes, rosy cheeks, and a happy girl in the morning." Casper?
Hmm?
If my mom's a ghost, did she forget about me?
No. She'd never forget you. Kat?

[about to sleep]
Mm-hmm?
If I were alive, would you go to the Halloween dance with me?
Mm-hmm.
Kat?
Mm-hmm.

[whispers]
Can I keep you?
Mm-hmm.
[Casper kisses Kat on the cheek]
Casper, close the window. It's cold.
[Casper curls up in bed by Kat's side]

[Arnold Schwarzenegger's voice]
Come with me if you want to live.
Honey, I think it's time that we sat down and had a little talk.
It's a little late for that, Dad.
How late?
Oh, don't worry, not that late.

[the image of Clint Eastwood appears in the mirror]
I'm gonna kill you... your momma... and all her bridge-playing friends.
[face Changes again, this time to Rodney Dangerfield]
You think YOU got it tough? I got a facelift! And there's one that looks just like it underneath!
Smell-o-gram!
No problem, Piece of cake... piece of CRUMB cake!
[last lines]

[after everyone has left]
Not bad for my first party, huh?

[friendly]
Couldn't have been better.
It ain't over get. BOYS!
[the Ghostly Trio appears and start playing Casper's song]
In two years I have been to nine different schools, eaten in nine cafeterias. I can't even remember anyone's name.
God, I'd kill for a pinky.

[singing]
It's my party and I'll die if I want do, die if I want to. You will die too, when it happens to you.

[looking down after Carrigan falls down the cliff]
Carrigan! Are you a ghost yet?
[no answer]
Carrigan! What a tragic waste. She had my favorite sunglasses.
I feel like Oprah on hiatus.
You look like Oprah on hiatus.
Scream or sugar?
[Dr Harvey has died and come back as a ghost]
I'm free! I've never felt so great in my life; I can fly-eee!
[He crashes into the floor]
Rookie.
Stinkie, work with him.

[stalking after Dibs, carrying a huge battle axe]
Damn it, Dibs! This won't hurt a bit! Stop bein' such a weenie! It's just business! COME ON!

[Dr. Harvey is sucking up all three ghosts in the vacuum]
This s... sucks!

[the Ghostly Trio along with Dr. Harvey are out partying, and Dr. Harvey is drunk, singing karaoke]
Hey, this Dr. Harvey's got a lot of spirit, you know what I'm sayin'?
Yeah, but he's got his whole miserable life ahead of him.
So we could do him a favor, and put him out of his misery.
Yeah. Hey, good idea. We've been The Ghostly Trio long enough. Time to make it a... quartet!

[eating breakfast with Stinkie and Fatso]
Ya know what the problem is? Casper's got no respect for us.
After all we've done for the little glowworm.
Yeah. HEY!
[he sees Casper cleaning the mess the trio made on the floor, via their breakfast]
What the hell do ya think you're doin', Bulbhead? This floor used to be dirty enough to eat off of.
But we have company.
Oh, yeah? Well, company loves misery.
[he turns into a Nike]
BOOM!
[he kicks Casper out of the way and the whole trio laughs and cheers]
[Dr Harvey pulls at the carpet to stop him rolling down the stairs, it comes away and he rolls down the stairs in the carpet]
Sushi, anyone? California roll, comin' up!

[the door knocks three times slowly]
That was fast. I... I believe it's for you, Doc.
[supernatural music plays as light starts to shine in the room. Dr. Harvey starts to answer it but looks back]

[with Stretch]
Go.
[Dr. Harvey continues his way to the door. The music intensifies. When he opens the door, light shines in his face and he stares in awe]
Amelia?
[the light and music fade as Fatso reveals himself in a red dress and makeup. He notices Dr. Harvey]
MY MAN!
[he pulls him in for a kiss]
MMMMMMMM-WAH!
[Dr. Harvey falls to the floor]
Hmm.
[Fatso laughs smugly]
